org.jboss.msc.inject

Class AtomicReferenceInjector<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.msc.inject.AtomicReferenceInjector<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Injector<T>
    Deprecated. 
    Use ServiceBuilder.provides(org.jboss.msc.service.ServiceName...) method instead. This class will be removed in a future release.

    @Deprecated
public final class AtomicReferenceInjector<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Injector<T>
    An injector which updates the value of an AtomicReference.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
